body_html: Yes, for the operations that can be parallelized across time or other dimensions you should use tensor operations (or implicit tensor operations in the new Linear). But for stateful recurrence you should use a native loop.
body_text: Yes, for the operations that can be parallelized across time or other dimensions you should use tensor operations (or implicit tensor operations in the new Linear). But for stateful recurrence you should use a native loop.
body: Yes, for the operations that can be parallelized across time or other dimensions you should use tensor operations (or implicit tensor operations in the new `Linear`). But for stateful recurrence you should use a native loop.
